string.ID: You should view the tooltip before equipping the axe.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]You should view the tooltip before equipping the axe.

string.ID: Huh, you somehow destroyed the battle axe. Let's move on.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]Huh, you somehow destroyed the battle axe. Let's move on.

string.ID: The battle axe has better penetration and deals more damage than your dagger.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]The battle axe has better penetration and deals more damage than your dagger.

string.ID:
Let’s take another look at weapon stats. Next to the {{c|→}} is 5. That means you’ll usually penetrate the armor of a creature with AV equal to 5.
You can penetrate armor multiple times, though, and each time you penetrate, you deal the weapon’s damage.
let’s equip it.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]Let’s take another look at weapon stats. Next to the {{c|→}} is 5. That means you’ll usually penetrate the armor of a creature with AV equal to 5.
You can penetrate armor multiple times, though, and each time you penetrate, you deal the weapon’s damage.
let’s equip it.

string.ID:
A battle axe. Get it.
Hit =commandKey:CmdUse=
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]A battle axe. Get it.
Hit =commandKey:CmdUse=

string.ID:
A battle axe. Get it.
Hit =commandKey:CmdGet=
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]A battle axe. Get it.
Hit =commandKey:CmdGet=

string.ID: Looks like there was some sort of battle to the north. Let’s grab the gear that was left behind.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]Looks like there was some sort of battle to the north. Let’s grab the gear that was left behind.

string.ID:
Let's take a look at the Equipment screen.
Press =commandKey:CmdCharacter=
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]Let's take a look at the Equipment screen.
Press =commandKey:CmdCharacter=

string.ID:
Let's take a look at the Equipment screen.
Press =commandKey:CmdEquipment=
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]Let's take a look at the Equipment screen.
Press =commandKey:CmdEquipment=

string.ID: Hold on, we want to show you the tooltip compare feature.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]Hold on, we want to show you the tooltip compare feature.

string.ID: Press =commandKey:GamepadAlt= + =commandKey:Take A Step= to view the tooltip.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]Press =commandKey:GamepadAlt= + =commandKey:Take A Step= to view the tooltip.

string.ID: Mouse over the battle axe and hover or press {{W|Alt}} to view the tooltip.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]Mouse over the battle axe and hover or press {{W|Alt}} to view the tooltip.

string.ID: Equip the battle axe since it's better than your dagger.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]Equip the battle axe since it's better than your dagger.

string.ID:
Select the Inventory && Equipment tab.
You can use =commandKey:Page Left= and =commandKey:Page Right= to navigate between tabs.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]Select the Inventory && Equipment tab.
You can use =commandKey:Page Left= and =commandKey:Page Right= to navigate between tabs.

string.ID:
The bear is dead! Looks like it dropped something, too.
But first, let's use this opportunity to heal.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]The bear is dead! Looks like it dropped something, too.
But first, let's use this opportunity to heal.

string.ID:
You regain hitpoints naturally as turns pass. You can pass a few turns by waiting, or if there are no hostile creatures around, you can {{W|rest until healed}}.
Press =commandKey:CmdWaitUntilHealed=
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]You regain hitpoints naturally as turns pass. You can pass a few turns by waiting, or if there are no hostile creatures around, you can {{W|rest until healed}}.
Press =commandKey:CmdWaitUntilHealed=

string.ID: It's a chem cell. It can be used later to power other artifacts you find.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]It's a chem cell. It can be used later to power other artifacts you find.

string.ID:
You picked up the odd trinket automatically because it is an artifact.
Press =commandKey:CmdCharacter= to investigate it.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]You picked up the odd trinket automatically because it is an artifact.
Press =commandKey:CmdCharacter= to investigate it.

string.ID:
You picked up the odd trinket automatically because it is an artifact.
Press =commandKey:CmdInventory= to investigate it.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]You picked up the odd trinket automatically because it is an artifact.
Press =commandKey:CmdInventory= to investigate it.

string.ID: The bear is dead! Looks like it dropped something, too.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]The bear is dead! Looks like it dropped something, too.

string.ID: This is an artifact beyond simple understanding. Try examining it.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]This is an artifact beyond simple understanding. Try examining it.

string.ID: The whole game world is a series of contiguous maps. Our passage continues off screen. Let's follow it. Walk north.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]The whole game world is a series of contiguous maps. Our passage continues off screen. Let's follow it. Walk north.

string.ID:
Oh! it looks like Warden Yrame killed Mehmet. Why, you ask?
Well, named creatures who you can perform the water ritual with, like Mehmet, generate with dynamic faction relationships. In your game, Mehmet must have been hated by the Fellowship of Wardens for some reason.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]Oh! it looks like Warden Yrame killed Mehmet. Why, you ask?
Well, named creatures who you can perform the water ritual with, like Mehmet, generate with dynamic faction relationships. In your game, Mehmet must have been hated by the Fellowship of Wardens for some reason.

string.ID:
And so Warden Yrame took her revenge. In Qud, sometimes even our best efforts at providing a safe starter village are foiled by the simulation!
What a charmed run! It's quite rare for this to happen, but now you get to see this hidden section of the tutorial. Good job.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]And so Warden Yrame took her revenge. In Qud, sometimes even our best efforts at providing a safe starter village are foiled by the simulation!
What a charmed run! It's quite rare for this to happen, but now you get to see this hidden section of the tutorial. Good job.

string.ID:
You have a few options now. You can roll with it and continue in this world where Mehmet's been revenge-slain. The early game will be a bit harder, but the main quest is not impacted.
You can start over and play the tutorial again, for the "normal" ending, which you were about to reach.
Or, since you were near the end anyway, you can start a new game and begin your journey proper!
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]You have a few options now. You can roll with it and continue in this world where Mehmet's been revenge-slain. The early game will be a bit harder, but the main quest is not impacted.
You can start over and play the tutorial again, for the "normal" ending, which you were about to reach.
Or, since you were near the end anyway, you can start a new game and begin your journey proper!

string.ID:
Whatever you choose, good luck, and feel free to return here for a refresher.
Live and drink.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]Whatever you choose, good luck, and feel free to return here for a refresher.
Live and drink.

string.ID:
Quetzal! That's all for the tutorial, friend.
We just scratched the very tip of the surface. Quests, secrets, leveling up, physics, reputation, limbs... we leave that for you to discover.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]Quetzal! That's all for the tutorial, friend.
We just scratched the very tip of the surface. Quests, secrets, leveling up, physics, reputation, limbs... we leave that for you to discover.

string.ID: You're ready to continue the journey on your own, but don't hesitate to play the tutorial again if you need a refresher.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]You're ready to continue the journey on your own, but don't hesitate to play the tutorial again if you need a refresher.

string.ID: Joppa is a village. Everything you learned in the cave applies here too. Villages are like caves with very high roofs.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]Joppa is a village. Everything you learned in the cave applies here too. Villages are like caves with very high roofs.

string.ID:
You can see a list of points of interest by pressing =commandKey:CmdMoveToPointOfInterest=.
The list will grow as you explore more of the map.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]You can see a list of points of interest by pressing =commandKey:CmdMoveToPointOfInterest=.
The list will grow as you explore more of the map.

string.ID:
You can see a list of points of interest by clicking this button or pressing =commandKey:CmdMoveToPointOfInterest=.
The list will grow as you explore more of the map.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]You can see a list of points of interest by clicking this button or pressing =commandKey:CmdMoveToPointOfInterest=.
The list will grow as you explore more of the map.

[届：\TODO]Ascend.
Press =commandKey:CmdMoveU=.

string.ID:
Ascend.
You can click this button or press =commandKey:CmdMoveU=.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]Ascend.
You can click this button or press =commandKey:CmdMoveU=.

string.ID: Finally, a staircase. Walk over to it.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]Finally, a staircase. Walk over to it.

string.ID:
You'll be able to explore the world freely after the tutorial.
For now, let's visit Joppa.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]You'll be able to explore the world freely after the tutorial.
For now, let's visit Joppa.

string.ID:
You can look around here just like on a local map.
Use =commandKey:LookDirection=
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]You can look around here just like on a local map.
Use =commandKey:LookDirection=

string.ID:
You can look around here just like on a local map.
Press =commandKey:CmdLook=
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]You can look around here just like on a local map.
Press =commandKey:CmdLook=

[届：\TODO]Descend.
Press =commandKey:CmdMoveD=.

string.ID:
Descend.
You can click this button or press =commandKey:CmdMoveD=.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]Descend.
You can click this button or press =commandKey:CmdMoveD=.

string.ID:
There's a village to the north called Joppa. Let's go there.
Hold =commandKey:IndicateDirection= towards the north and press =commandKey:Take A Step=.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]There's a village to the north called Joppa. Let's go there.
Hold =commandKey:IndicateDirection= towards the north and press =commandKey:Take A Step=.

string.ID:
There's a village to the north called Joppa. Let's go there.
Press =commandKey:CmdMoveN= or =commandKey:AdventureMouseContextAction=.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]There's a village to the north called Joppa. Let's go there.
Press =commandKey:CmdMoveN= or =commandKey:AdventureMouseContextAction=.

string.ID: Wait for the bear to take a step towards you.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]Wait for the bear to take a step towards you.

string.ID: Make sure the bear is in the path of your freezing ray.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]Make sure the bear is in the path of your freezing ray.

string.ID: What's that??? Some sort of creature. Take a closer look at it.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]What's that??? Some sort of creature. Take a closer look at it.

string.ID: It's quite dangerous to fight this bear in melee combat! Try backing away and using Freezing Ray.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]It's quite dangerous to fight this bear in melee combat! Try backing away and using Freezing Ray.

string.ID: Let's take a look at the bear before we continue.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]Let's take a look at the bear before we continue.

string.ID:
Oh! Another creature. Let's look at it more closely.
When you come across something new, it's always a good idea to inspect it.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]Oh! Another creature. Let's look at it more closely.
When you come across something new, it's always a good idea to inspect it.

string.ID: The bear is wounded, but it's tough. This'll be a harder fight.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]The bear is wounded, but it's tough. This'll be a harder fight.

string.ID: Use =commandKey:LookDirection= to look at the bear.

Look view lets you look around and investigate your surroundings.
Move the cursor to the bear.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]Look view lets you look around and investigate your surroundings.
Move the cursor to the bear.

string.ID:
You can wait a turn for the bear to approach. That way, it won't be in range to attack you when it takes its turn.
Tap =commandKey:Take A Step= without choosing a direction with the stick to pass a turn.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]You can wait a turn for the bear to approach. That way, it won't be in range to attack you when it takes its turn.
Tap =commandKey:Take A Step= without choosing a direction with the stick to pass a turn.

string.ID:
You can wait a turn for the bear to approach. That way, it won't be in range to attack you when it takes its turn.
Press =commandKey:CmdWait:allbinds= or =commandKey:AdventureMouseContextAction= on your character to pass a turn.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]You can wait a turn for the bear to approach. That way, it won't be in range to attack you when it takes its turn.
Press =commandKey:CmdWait:allbinds= or =commandKey:AdventureMouseContextAction= on your character to pass a turn.

string.ID:
You missed, then the bear attacked and missed.
Attack again.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]You missed, then the bear attacked and missed.
Attack again.

string.ID:
This time you hit, but you failed to penetrate the bear's armor.
Then, the bear hit you and DID penetrate your armor. You took 4 damage.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]This time you hit, but you failed to penetrate the bear's armor.
Then, the bear hit you and DID penetrate your armor. You took 4 damage.

string.ID:
Let's try using an ability. Look at your ability bar. Let's start sprinting.
Select it with =commandKey:Next Ability= and =commandKey:Previous Ability= then press =commandKey:Use Ability=.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]Let's try using an ability. Look at your ability bar. Let's start sprinting.
Select it with =commandKey:Next Ability= and =commandKey:Previous Ability= then press =commandKey:Use Ability=.

string.ID: Let's try using an ability. Look at your ability bar. Let's start sprinting. You can click the button or hit the hotkey =commandKey:CmdAbility1=.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]Let's try using an ability. Look at your ability bar. Let's start sprinting. You can click the button or hit the hotkey =commandKey:CmdAbility1=.

string.ID: Sprinting doubles your movespeed but ends if you make an attack. Let's sprint back down the corridor to put some distance between us and the bear.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]Sprinting doubles your movespeed but ends if you make an attack. Let's sprint back down the corridor to put some distance between us and the bear.

string.ID:
Every character has Sprint, but most of your abilities are determined by traits like your mutations. You have Freezing Ray, so you can shoot frost out of your hands.
Select it with =commandKey:Next Ability= and =commandKey:Previous Ability= then press =commandKey:Use Ability=.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]Every character has Sprint, but most of your abilities are determined by traits like your mutations. You have Freezing Ray, so you can shoot frost out of your hands.
Select it with =commandKey:Next Ability= and =commandKey:Previous Ability= then press =commandKey:Use Ability=.

string.ID:
Every character has Sprint, but most of your abilities are determined by traits like your mutations. You have Freezing Ray, so you can shoot frost out of your hands. Select it.
Press =commandKey:CmdAbility2=
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]Every character has Sprint, but most of your abilities are determined by traits like your mutations. You have Freezing Ray, so you can shoot frost out of your hands. Select it.
Press =commandKey:CmdAbility2=

string.ID: Before you move on, you should loot the corpse of the snapjaw.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]Before you move on, you should loot the corpse of the snapjaw.

string.ID: Take a look at the snapjaw before we continue.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]Take a look at the snapjaw before we continue.

string.ID: Huh, you somehow destroyed the leather armor. Let's move on.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]Huh, you somehow destroyed the leather armor. Let's move on.

string.ID: Let's explore further into the cave.

Let's explore further into the cave.
Walk down the passage.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]Let's explore further into the cave.
Walk down the passage.

string.ID: Looking at a creature shows its description and some other important details. Every object in the world can be looked at.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]Looking at a creature shows its description and some other important details. Every object in the world can be looked at.

string.ID: The snapjaw is hostile! Let's get ready for a fight.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]The snapjaw is hostile! Let's get ready for a fight.

string.ID: Use =commandKey:LookDirection= to look at the snapjaw.
Here we have a description of the creature, along with some details about them.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]Here we have a description of the creature, along with some details about them.

string.ID:
Look view lets you look around and investigate your surroundings.
Move the cursor to the snapjaw.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]Look view lets you look around and investigate your surroundings.
Move the cursor to the snapjaw.

string.ID:
All actions are turn-based, meaning you take a turn, then other creatures take a turn. For the most part, creatures won't act until you do.
If you ever get panicked, just slow down and consider your next move. There's no rush.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]All actions are turn-based, meaning you take a turn, then other creatures take a turn. For the most part, creatures won't act until you do.
If you ever get panicked, just slow down and consider your next move. There's no rush.

string.ID: You can attack a hostile creature by moving into its square. This is called {{W|bump attacking}}.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]You can attack a hostile creature by moving into its square. This is called {{W|bump attacking}}.

string.ID: Take a step toward the snapjaw.

You can pick up things that are in the same space as you.
Press =commandKey:CmdUse=
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]You can pick up things that are in the same space as you.
Press =commandKey:CmdUse=

string.ID:
You can pick up things that are in the same space as you.
Press =commandKey:CmdGet=
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]You can pick up things that are in the same space as you.
Press =commandKey:CmdGet=

string.ID:
Whew! You killed the snapjaw and earned some experience. It looks like they dropped a piece of equipment, too.
Press =commandKey:CmdGetFrom= and then choose a direction or press =commandKey:AdventureMouseInteract=.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]Whew! You killed the snapjaw and earned some experience. It looks like they dropped a piece of equipment, too.
Press =commandKey:CmdGetFrom= and then choose a direction or press =commandKey:AdventureMouseInteract=.

string.ID:
Let's look at the leather armor you picked up.
Armor has an armor value ({{b|♦}}{{y|2}}) and a dodge value ({{K|○}}{{y|0}})
Both help you avoid damage.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]Let's look at the leather armor you picked up.
Armor has an armor value ({{b|♦}}{{y|2}}) and a dodge value ({{K|○}}{{y|0}})
Both help you avoid damage.

string.ID: It's leather armor. This time, get it instead of equipping it.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]It's leather armor. This time, get it instead of equipping it.

string.ID: This is your equipment and inventory screen. Equipped items on the left, and inventory on the right.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]This is your equipment and inventory screen. Equipped items on the left, and inventory on the right.

string.ID:
You can also equip items by dragging them from your inventory to their equipment slot.
By the way, you have several other tabs in your character sheet. Feel free to explore them later.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]You can also equip items by dragging them from your inventory to their equipment slot.
By the way, you have several other tabs in your character sheet. Feel free to explore them later.

string.ID:
Sometimes squares have multiple items in them.
To see everything in a space, press =commandKey:CmdGetFrom= and then choose a direction or press =commandKey:AdventureMouseInteractAll=.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]Sometimes squares have multiple items in them.
To see everything in a space, press =commandKey:CmdGetFrom= and then choose a direction or press =commandKey:AdventureMouseInteractAll=.

string.ID:
Whoever this was, they had some books. All books can be read in game.
Books with {{Y|white}} titles are generated and usually contain nonsense, but the nonsense can occasionally be useful.
Books with {{W|gold}} titles are more valuable: they are handwritten by in-world beings and contain interesting takes on the world.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]Whoever this was, they had some books. All books can be read in game.
Books with {{Y|white}} titles are generated and usually contain nonsense, but the nonsense can occasionally be useful.
Books with {{W|gold}} titles are more valuable: they are handwritten by in-world beings and contain interesting takes on the world.

string.ID: This water is valuable too. Take it all.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]This water is valuable too. Take it all.

string.ID:
Welcome to the Caves of Qud tutorial. We'll just be scratching the surface here, learning enough of the basics to help you get your footing.
In Caves of Qud, you play as a mutated human or true kin.
For the tutorial, we're picking mutated human.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]Welcome to the Caves of Qud tutorial. We'll just be scratching the surface here, learning enough of the basics to help you get your footing.
In Caves of Qud, you play as a mutated human or true kin.
For the tutorial, we're picking mutated human.

string.ID:
Character creation is a deep and sometimes long process. We included some preset builds to help you get started. After the tutorial, you can try another build, or make a character from scratch. (The recommended way! Once you get your footing.)
For now, pick the marsh taur.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]Character creation is a deep and sometimes long process. We included some preset builds to help you get started. After the tutorial, you can try another build, or make a character from scratch. (The recommended way! Once you get your footing.)
For now, pick the marsh taur.

string.ID: Here is a summary of your attributes and mutations, which grant your character unique abilities.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]Here is a summary of your attributes and mutations, which grant your character unique abilities.

string.ID: You can name your character or choose Next for a random name.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]You can name your character or choose Next for a random name.

string.ID: On the 30th of Kisu Ux, you scuttle down a dark shaft at the edge of a sunken trade path and arrive at a caravanserai. It's powdered in salt and dust from across the ribbon of time.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]On the 30th of Kisu Ux, you scuttle down a dark shaft at the edge of a sunken trade path and arrive at a caravanserai. It's powdered in salt and dust from across the ribbon of time.

string.ID: We're on the surface now. We can walk the whole world this way, or we can access the worldmap to fast travel.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]We're on the surface now. We can walk the whole world this way, or we can access the worldmap to fast travel.

string.ID: But first, you just became hungry. You need to eat.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]But first, you just became hungry. You need to eat.

string.ID: Let's make camp. How about next to that beetle over there.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]Let's make camp. How about next to that beetle over there.

string.ID:
Let's not be rude. Talk to the beetle.
Press =commandKey:CmdUse= or =commandKey:AdventureMouseContextAction=.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]Let's not be rude. Talk to the beetle.
Press =commandKey:CmdUse= or =commandKey:AdventureMouseContextAction=.

string.ID: Let's not be rude. Talk to the beetle.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]Let's not be rude. Talk to the beetle.

string.ID:
Not much of a talker. But that's not true for everyone. As long as a creature isn't hostile, you can try to chat with them.
Let see what the beetle has for trade.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]Not much of a talker. But that's not true for everyone. As long as a creature isn't hostile, you can try to chat with them.
Let see what the beetle has for trade.

string.ID:
The beetle's inventory is on the left, and your inventory is on the right.
The beetle has some witchwood bark. That's useful — it heals you when you eat it. Let's trade for it.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]The beetle's inventory is on the left, and your inventory is on the right.
The beetle has some witchwood bark. That's useful — it heals you when you eat it. Let's trade for it.

string.ID:
The beetle has some witchwood bark. That's useful — it heals you when you eat it. Let's trade for it.
Press =commandKey:CmdTradeAdd= or =commandKey:AdventureMouseContextAction=
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]The beetle has some witchwood bark. That's useful — it heals you when you eat it. Let's trade for it.
Press =commandKey:CmdTradeAdd= or =commandKey:AdventureMouseContextAction=

string.ID:
We don't need this dagger any more, so we can trade it away.
Press =commandKey:CmdTradeAdd= or =commandKey:AdventureMouseContextAction=
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]We don't need this dagger any more, so we can trade it away.
Press =commandKey:CmdTradeAdd= or =commandKey:AdventureMouseContextAction=

string.ID:
The trade is uneven, so we'll have to pony up some money.
In the salt-stippled ecosystem of Qud, {{B|fresh water}} is currency. You need to drink it, too, so don't spend it all.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]The trade is uneven, so we'll have to pony up some money.
In the salt-stippled ecosystem of Qud, {{B|fresh water}} is currency. You need to drink it, too, so don't spend it all.

string.ID:
Now to go to the world map. Try ascending again.
Press =commandKey:CmdMoveU=.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]Now to go to the world map. Try ascending again.
Press =commandKey:CmdMoveU=.

string.ID:
Now to go to the world map. Try ascending again.
You can click this button or press =commandKey:CmdMoveU=.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]Now to go to the world map. Try ascending again.
You can click this button or press =commandKey:CmdMoveU=.

string.ID: Before you move on, you should equip yourself from the nearby chest.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]Before you move on, you should equip yourself from the nearby chest.

string.ID:
This is the main gameplay stage. At the top of the screen are your attributes, HP, and XP.
On the right are action buttons, minimap, and the message log.
At the bottom is your ability hotbar.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]This is the main gameplay stage. At the top of the screen are your attributes, HP, and XP.
On the right are action buttons, minimap, and the message log.
At the bottom is your ability hotbar.

string.ID: Let's explore this cave we've found ourselves in.

strings.string: [届：\TODO]Let's explore this cave we've found ourselves in.

string.ID:
Huh, you destroyed the tutorial chest we were going to teach you how to use.
Go ahead and pick of the torch and dagger from the floor.
string.Value:
[届：\TODO]Huh, you destroyed the tutorial chest we were going to teach you how to use.
Go ahead and pick of the torch and dagger from the floor.

string.ID:
That save file looks like it's from an older save format revision (=gameVersion=). Sorry!
You can probably change to a previous branch in your game client and get it to load if you want to finish it off.
